keynote.speaker: David Heymann
keynote.title: KEYNOTE PANEL: THE GLOBAL CALL TO ACTION
keynote.body: A persistent concern among those leading the charge against AMR is that the energy and momentum around the global call to action, so palpable following the UNGA special declaration in September 2016, are faltering and political will is fading. Where does the global call to action go from here?

panel.speaker: Jean Patel
